title: How to get the notification and application form for the Rajasthan NTSE Stage I 2019-20 - Quora
tags: Central Board of Secondary Education, India

response.answer_text: Contact your respective schools for submission of Application FormLast date of online submission by school (without late fees) is 19th September 2019 http://bserexam.net/BsErSTSE2019/mainpage.php
